duties_responsibilities.duty: Measuring, mixing, and preparing raw materials according to company specifications and recipes.
Forming, cutting, molding, shaping, and baking dough.
Monitoring cooking completion times and setting heat and humidity temperatures for proof box.
Checking product to ensure it meets quality standards.
Ensuring temp, sweep, and sanitation logs are completed.
Providing excellent customer service, addressing needs of customers in a timely and effective manner and modeling suggestive selling techniques.
Maximizing sales potential through effective and proper procedures for prepping, storing, rotating, stocking, and merchandising product.
Following and complying with established procedures, including Weights and Measures, health and sanitation, and safe work practices.
Maintaining a clean and sanitary working and shopping environment; maintaining equipment in accordance with cleanliness and safety standards.
Performing opening, mid, and closing duties as assigned; ensuring accuracy of signs and pricing.
Immediately reporting safety hazards and violations.
Performing other duties as assigned by store, regional, or national leadership.
